import React from 'react'; import './card.css'; const Card =({name,email,id,number,depart,arrive,prix,date,hd,ha,onPayment})=>{ return (
{/*partie profil nom date boutton*/}

{name}

☎ : {number}

{date}

{/* partie 2*/}

{hd}

{depart}

{ha}

{arrive}

{prix} DH

onPayment({id})} />
) } export default Card;
